rule: If it is not possible to determine the part of speech from the input, the output should only contain the word "CantAnswer".

5. Since the word is not present in the sentence, the input does not comply with the specification that the word must be part of the sentence.

Based on this evaluation, the input violates the specification because the word "qwertyuiop" is not in the sentence.
